column4: did anyone tell you that it is a very bad idea ™ to irc as root?
what is bad with run irssi as root?
the linux concept of user permissions is based on the fact that a normal user cannot do much harm to the system, running all programs as root invalidates that...
btw what system are you running?
yeah right, i just started irssi in my already opened term, and i forgot that i was logged as root ^
I asked because normally you don't run anything as root, you cannot login as root
i can su to root in term..
no, you cannot - on a standard ubuntu at least
i just in stalled ubuntu 1 minute ago and you see.. it works ^^
why you can´t do this usually?

no, on a standard ubuntu you only can use sudo (sudo -s at most) - that prevents you from having a term running as root and exposing your system to the risk of you doing something foolish :-)

do take your time - but please don't work as root when you are not doing any administrative work in your system
